last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: From the meaning behind the finale's title to Geralt's dream and Yennefer's real motivation, Hissrich dissects events as the paths of destiny collide.

name: The Witcher: A Look Inside the Episodes
original_name: The Witcher: A Look Inside the Episodes
overview: With series creator Lauren S. Hissrich as your guide, take an in-depth journey into the stories and themes powering the first season of The Witcher.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Series creator and showrunner Lauren S. Hissrich breaks down the opening scenes and outlines how Geralt's encounter with Renfri sets up the season.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Take a deep dive into the crucial role that Yennefer's backstory plays in her journey, and how the elves are a pillar in the Continent's world-building.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Delve into Geralt and Yennefers transformation stories, as he turns from slayer to savior, and she makes the ultimate sacrifice to become beautiful.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Hissrich explains how the show's timelines come together, the moment Geralt changes his destiny and what compels Ciri to continue on her quest.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Find out why the writers gave Geralt a terrible bout of insomnia and explore the magic-entangled dynamics of his fateful first encounter with Yennefer.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: After an intimate glimpse inside Geralt and Yennefer's complicated relationship, discover what it means for Ciri's story arc when she picks up a knife.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Dig into Geralt's white-knight complex, Ciri's character growth and what Hissrich describes as one of the season's loveliest scenes.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: From the meaning behind the finale's title to Geralt's dream and Yennefer's real motivation, Hissrich dissects events as the paths of destiny collide.
